<title level="1" right="Rules">[Critical Specialization Effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 283 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Certain feats, class features, weapon runes, and other effects can grant you additional benefits when you make a Strike with certain weapons and get a critical success. This is called a critical specialization effect. The exact effect depends on which weapon group your weapon belongs to, as listed [here](/equipment/weapons/specializations). You can always decide not to add the critical specialization effect of your weapon.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Critical Specialization Effects
